short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: adds some gambling games to google classroom

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you an avid gambler that is being held back by the world of academia? well look no further than this chrome extension that allows you to play some gambling games on google classroom. 

*no actual cash prizes can be won by users, this is purely for fun, if you are thinking about actually gambling you are likely to lose more than you win. 
*Do not take any of the images endorsing gambling seriously as they are intended to be humorous in nature
